de.mpg.biochem.mars.fx.plot.tools

Class SegmentDataSetRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gsi.chart.renderer.spi.AbstractDataSetManagement<R>
      • de.gsi.chart.renderer.spi.AbstractPointReductionManagment<R>
        • de.gsi.chart.renderer.spi.AbstractErrorDataSetRendererParameter<SegmentDataSetRenderer>
          • de.mpg.biochem.mars.fx.plot.tools.SegmentDataSetRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.gsi.chart.renderer.Renderer

    public class SegmentDataSetRenderer
extends de.gsi.chart.renderer.spi.AbstractErrorDataSetRendererParameter<SegmentDataSetRenderer>
implements de.gsi.chart.renderer.Renderer
    Renders data points with error bars and/or error surfaces It can be used e.g. to render horizontal and/or vertical errors additional functionality:
    • bar-type plot
    • polar-axis plotting
    • scatter and/or bubble-chart-type plots
    Author:
    R.J. Steinhagen, Karl Duderstadt - many changes to all for segment plotting and custom styling.
